name: Planets (vay4ie)
description:
Planets is a game where you control two opposite temperature planets that has been joined together with the gravitation, so now they are on the same orbit. 

Smaller planets fly around the planets controlled by the player, also having different temperatures. When colliding with small planets, large planets change their size and temperature.

 Try to keep the temperature balance between this two planets as long as possible, otherwise the whole system will collapse!

This game is made for GMTK Game Jam 2021
